Name: ABE VR
About the game: ABE VR is an intense experience that recreates the horrifying story about a misguided robot seeking the unconditional love of humans…at whatever cost. Created in Unreal Engine, and continuing our filmmaking in virtual reality, ABE VR is based on ABE the multi-award winning short film, and planned feature film, written and directed by Rob McLellan. No longer do you have to just watch the film, you now get to experience it as a character. Specifically, ABE’s chosen victim.
Meta Title: ABE VR: Jun 23, 2016, Hammerhead VR and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ABE VR? Check out the release date (Jun 23, 2016), developer insights from Hammerhead VR, and a complete game summary.
